titles.title: Conservation Reserve Program Extension Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to extend, improve, increase flexibility, and increase conservation benefits of the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12941-12942)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 9/14/1994--Introduced. Conservation Reserve Program Extension Act of 1994 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to: (1) reauthorize the conservation reserve program; and (2) revise contract acceptance criteria.
